remote-lab.net learn by doing

Cisco IOS DHCP search option

12 Apr 2013

I was looking today for a way to set my home Cisco router to push multiple domains in the DHCP search list. I found this very useful post written by Jonathan Perkin: http://www.perkin.org.uk/posts/serving-multiple-dns-search-domains-in-ios-dhcp.html where he explains how we can achieve this by using Ciscoâ€™s hex sequence in the search option. He also provides a nice python script that converts the domain ASCII string to hex sequence.

Thank you very much, Jonathan, very useful info.
